This product is truly one-of-a-kind, and I believe it will be a valuable asset to your [Bob's Company/Situation]. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
